title: Are we just going to forget the fact that blue essence is still bullshit
body: Seriously, it took me like a week before to get a champion, now it can take up to a month. The goal was to make leveling and acquiring champions easier, but it just made it 10x harder. And don't even try and pretend that adding 50 blue essence to the fwotd did anything, it just made leveling even more painful.
